reviews.text: Frequent services to both Glasgow main stations,  amazing views of the town and a slight decay that gives it character and charm.
Good station and right next to Clydebank bus terminal and Clydebank shopping centre.

Clyebank train station good thing about this is location at bottom of shopping centre and next to taxi rank and bus terminal. The station has ramp access leading down to buses. Has stairs leading up to platform. Also bridge to take you over to other side platform for trains Helensburgh ect. Ticket booth inside building also help box if you have problems.

Station is manned but at reduced hours. No shelter when unmanned. Easy access to local shopping centres, as well as the Titan Crane attraction near the riverside. Ramp and steps access to platform Level.
Love coming to Clydebank got everything I want  x
